positions.description: In my role at Skanska I will provide assistance with the identification of potential federal projects to pursue, development of procurement strategies and involvement with the pursuits on a nationwide basis.I will also provide operational support to our ongoing federal construction projects across the United States.

positions.title: Cost Accountant/Quality Control Supervisor
positions.description:
One of three Cost accountants for $900,000,000.00 contract at the Marble Hill Nuclear Power Plant. Responsbile for quanifying all work put in place and tracking cost accounts for the 2500 craft employed by Gust K. Newberg.

Quality Control Supervisor for validation and repair of all Category 1 concrete structures. Intense 7day/24hour schedule for 16 months to complete the task prior to any new Category 1 construction commencing within the Auxillary, Fuel Handling, Nuclear Steam Tunnel and Reactor buildings.

given.text:
John came to the Northern California Office of Hensel Phelps Construction Co. as our first Director of Marketing and Business Development. John's background and training as an Executive with IBM brought unique and fresh concepts focusing on customer satisfaction from an owner's vantage point. One of John's strengths is facilitating procurement strategy meetings and pulling the best ideas from the group. It was a pleasure working alongside John. We still stay in touch on a regular basis.
